channel.title: Music on Sergio Carracedo
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Sergio Carracedo

item.title: My favourite music covers
item.description:
A cover version is a new performance or recording by someone other than the original artist typically with another production style or genre.

As is Xmas time, this is a cover of “Carol of Bells” with metal style:

Long time ago, in the Napster epoch, I discovered the covers, specifically punk covers of pop songs. It was a revelation for me, and I started to search for more and more covers. With the time I discovered that there are a lot of covers, not only punk covers, but also metal, rock, and other genres covers of pop songs, and also covers of other songs.
